file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: info@banzaicloud.com
    name: Banzai Cloud
  description: |-
    The product info application uses the cloud provider APIs to asynchronously fetch and parse instance type attributes
    and prices, while storing the results in an in memory cache and making it available as structured data through a REST API.
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  title: Product Info.
  version: 0.5.0
servers:
- url: /api/v1
paths:
  /continents:
    get:
      description: Returns the supported continents
      operationId: getContinents
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContinentsResponse'
          description: ContinentsResponse
      tags:
      - continents
  /providers:
    get:
      description: Returns the supported providers
      operationId: getProviders
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProvidersResponse'
          description: ProvidersResponse
      tags:
      - providers
  /providers/{provider}:
    get:
      description: Returns the requested provider
      operationId: getProvider
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProviderResponse'
          description: ProviderResponse
      tags:
      - provider
  /providers/{provider}/services:
    get:
      description: Provides a list with the available services for the provider
      operationId: getServices
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServicesResponse'
          description: ServicesResponse
      tags:
      - services
  /providers/{provider}/services/{service}:
    get:
      description: Provides service details for the given service on the provider in the given region
      operationId: getService
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Service
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceResponse'
          description: ServiceResponse
      tags:
      - service
  /providers/{provider}/services/{service}/continents:
    get:
      description: Provides the list of available continents and regions of a cloud provider
      operationId: getContinentsData
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Service
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContinentsDataResponse'
          description: ContinentsDataResponse
      tags:
      - continents
  /providers/{provider}/services/{service}/regions:
    get:
      description: Provides the list of available regions of a cloud provider
      operationId: getRegions
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Service
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RegionsResponse'
          description: RegionsResponse
      tags:
      - regions
  /providers/{provider}/services/{service}/regions/{region}:
    get:
      description: Provides the detailed info of a specific region of a cloud provider
      operationId: getRegion
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Service
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: region
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Region
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetRegionResp'
          description: GetRegionResp
      tags:
      - region
  /providers/{provider}/services/{service}/regions/{region}/images:
    get:
      operationId: getImages
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Service
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: region
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Region
      - explode: true
        in: query
        name: gpu
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
        x-go-name: Gpu
      - explode: true
        in: query
        name: version
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
        x-go-name: Version
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ImagesResponse'
          description: ImagesResponse
      summary: Provides a list of available images on a given provider in a specific region for a service.
      tags:
      - images
  /providers/{provider}/services/{service}/regions/{region}/products:
    get:
      operationId: getProducts
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Service
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: region
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Region
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductDetailsResponse'
          description: ProductDetailsResponse
      summary: Provides a list of available machine types on a given provider in a specific region.
      tags:
      - products
  /providers/{provider}/services/{service}/regions/{region}/versions:
    get:
      operationId: getVersions
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: provider
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Provider
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Service
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: region
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
        x-go-name: Region
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VersionsResponse'
          description: VersionsResponse
      summary: Provides a list of available versions on a given provider in a specific region for a service.
      tags:
      - versions
components:
  schemas:
    AttributeResponse:
      description: AttributeResponse holds attribute values
      properties:
        attributeName:
          type: string
          x-go-name: AttributeName
        attributeValues:
          items:
            format: double
            type: number
          type: array
          x-go-name: AttributeValues
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    Continent:
      description: Continent holds continent and regions of a cloud provider
      example:
        regions:
        - name: name
          id: id
        - name: name
          id: id
        name: name
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Name
        regions:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Region'
          type: array
          x-go-name: Regions
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    ContinentsDataResponse:
      description: ContinentsDataResponse holds the list of available continents and regions of a cloud provider
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Continent'
      type: array
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    ContinentsResponse:
      description: ContinentsResponse holds the list of available continents
      items:
        type: string
      type: array
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    GetAttributeValuesPathParams:
      description: GetAttributeValuesPathParams is a placeholder for the get attribute values route's path parameters
      properties:
        attribute:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Attribute
        provider:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Provider
        region:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Region
        service:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Service
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    GetImagesQueryParams:
      description: GetImagesQueryParams is a placeholder for the get images query parameters
      properties:
        gpu:
          description: in:query
          type: string
          x-go-name: Gpu
        version:
          description: in:query
          type: string
          x-go-name: Version
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    GetProviderPathParams:
      description: GetProviderPathParams is a placeholder for the providers related route path parameters
      properties:
        provider:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Provider
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    GetRegionPathParams:
      description: GetRegionPathParams is a placeholder for the regions related route path parameters
      properties:
        provider:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Provider
        region:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Region
        service:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Service
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    GetRegionResp:
      description: GetRegionResp holds the detailed description of a specific region of a cloud provider
      example:
        name: name
        id: id
        zones:
        - zones
        - zones
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Id
        name:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Name
        zones:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
          x-go-name: Zones
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    GetServicesPathParams:
      description: GetServicesPathParams is a placeholder for the services related route path parameters
      properties:
        provider:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Provider
        service:
          description: in:path
          type: string
          x-go-name: Service
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    Image:
      description: Image represents an image
      example:
        name: name
        gpu: true
        version: version
      properties:
        gpu:
          type: boolean
          x-go-name: GpuAvailable
        name:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Name
        version:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Version
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/pkg/cloudinfo
    ImagesResponse:
      description: ImagesResponse holds the list of available images
      example:
        images:
        - name: name
          gpu: true
          version: version
        - name: name
          gpu: true
          version: version
      properties:
        images:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Image'
          type: array
          x-go-name: Images
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    LocationVersion:
      description: LocationVersion struct for displaying version information per location
      example:
        default: default
        versions:
        - versions
        - versions
        location: location
      properties:
        default:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Default
        location:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Location
        versions:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
          x-go-name: Versions
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/pkg/cloudinfo
    ProductDetails:
      description: ProductDetails extended view of the virtual machine details
      example:
        currentGen: true
        spotPrice:
        - zone: zone
          price: 5.63737665663332876420099637471139430999755859375
        - zone: zone
          price: 5.63737665663332876420099637471139430999755859375
        ntwPerf: ntwPerf
        type: type
        zones:
        - zones
        - zones
        cpusPerVm: 0.80082819046101150206595775671303272247314453125
        memPerVm: 1.46581298050294517310021547018550336360931396484375
        gpusPerVm: 6.02745618307040320615897144307382404804229736328125
        attributes:
          key: attributes
        ntwPerfCategory: ntwPerfCategory
        burst: true
        category: category
        onDemandPrice: 5.962133916683182377482808078639209270477294921875
      properties:
        attributes:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          type: object
          x-go-name: Attributes
        burst:
          description: Burst this is derived for now
          type: boolean
          x-go-name: Burst
        category:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Category
        cpusPerVm:
          format: double
          type: number
          x-go-name: Cpus
        currentGen:
          description: CurrentGen signals whether the instance type generation is the current one. Only applies for amazon
          type: boolean
          x-go-name: CurrentGen
        gpusPerVm:
          format: double
          type: number
          x-go-name: Gpus
        memPerVm:
          format: double
          type: number
          x-go-name: Mem
        ntwPerf:
          type: string
          x-go-name: NtwPerf
        ntwPerfCategory:
          type: string
          x-go-name: NtwPerfCat
        onDemandPrice:
          format: double
          type: number
          x-go-name: OnDemandPrice
        spotPrice:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ZonePrice'
          type: array
          x-go-name: SpotPrice
        type:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Type
        zones:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
          x-go-name: Zones
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/pkg/cloudinfo
    ProductDetailsResponse:
      description: ProductDetailsResponse Api object to be mapped to product info response
      example:
        scrapingTime: scrapingTime
        products:
        - currentGen: true
          spotPrice:
          - zone: zone
            price: 5.63737665663332876420099637471139430999755859375
          - zone: zone
            price: 5.63737665663332876420099637471139430999755859375
          ntwPerf: ntwPerf
          type: type
          zones:
          - zones
          - zones
          cpusPerVm: 0.80082819046101150206595775671303272247314453125
          memPerVm: 1.46581298050294517310021547018550336360931396484375
          gpusPerVm: 6.02745618307040320615897144307382404804229736328125
          attributes:
            key: attributes
          ntwPerfCategory: ntwPerfCategory
          burst: true
          category: category
          onDemandPrice: 5.962133916683182377482808078639209270477294921875
        - currentGen: true
          spotPrice:
          - zone: zone
            price: 5.63737665663332876420099637471139430999755859375
          - zone: zone
            price: 5.63737665663332876420099637471139430999755859375
          ntwPerf: ntwPerf
          type: type
          zones:
          - zones
          - zones
          cpusPerVm: 0.80082819046101150206595775671303272247314453125
          memPerVm: 1.46581298050294517310021547018550336360931396484375
          gpusPerVm: 6.02745618307040320615897144307382404804229736328125
          attributes:
            key: attributes
          ntwPerfCategory: ntwPerfCategory
          burst: true
          category: category
          onDemandPrice: 5.962133916683182377482808078639209270477294921875
      properties:
        products:
          description: Products represents a slice of products for a given provider (VMs with attributes and process)
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductDetails'
          type: array
          x-go-name: Products
        scrapingTime:
          description: ScrapingTime represents scraping time for a given provider in milliseconds
          type: string
          x-go-name: ScrapingTime
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    Provider:
      description: Provider represents a cloud provider
      example:
        provider: provider
        services:
        - isStatic: true
          service: service
        - isStatic: true
          service: service
      properties:
        provider:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Provider
        services:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
          type: array
          x-go-name: Services
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/pkg/cloudinfo
    ProviderResponse:
      description: ProviderResponse is the response used for the requested provider
      example:
        provider:
          provider: provider
          services:
          - isStatic: true
            service: service
          - isStatic: true
            service: service
      properties:
        provider:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Provider'
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    ProvidersResponse:
      description: ProvidersResponse is the response used for the supported providers
      example:
        providers:
        - provider: provider
          services:
          - isStatic: true
            service: service
          - isStatic: true
            service: service
        - provider: provider
          services:
          - isStatic: true
            service: service
          - isStatic: true
            service: service
      properties:
        providers:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Provider'
          type: array
          x-go-name: Providers
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    Region:
      description: Region hold the id and name of a cloud provider region
      example:
        name: name
        id: id
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Id
        name:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Name
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/pkg/cloudinfo
    RegionsResponse:
      description: RegionsResponse holds the list of available regions of a cloud provider
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Region'
      type: array
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    Service:
      description: it's intended to implement the ServiceDescriber interface
      example:
        isStatic: true
        service: service
      properties:
        isStatic:
          type: boolean
          x-go-name: IsStatic
        service:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Service
      title: Service represents a service supported by a given provider.
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/pkg/cloudinfo
    ServiceResponse:
      description: ServiceResponse holds the list of available services
      example:
        service:
          isStatic: true
          service: service
      properties:
        service:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    ServicesResponse:
      description: ServicesResponse holds the list of available services
      example:
        services:
        - isStatic: true
          service: service
        - isStatic: true
          service: service
      properties:
        services:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
          type: array
          x-go-name: Services
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    VersionsResponse:
      description: VersionsResponse holds the list of available versions
      example:
        versions:
        - default: default
          versions:
          - versions
          - versions
          location: location
        - default: default
          versions:
          - versions
          - versions
          location: location
      properties:
        versions:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocationVersion'
          type: array
          x-go-name: Versions
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/internal/app/cloudinfo/api
    ZonePrice:
      description: ZonePrice struct for displaying price information per zone
      example:
        zone: zone
        price: 5.63737665663332876420099637471139430999755859375
      properties:
        price:
          format: double
          type: number
          x-go-name: Price
        zone:
          type: string
          x-go-name: Zone
      type: object
      x-go-package: github.com/banzaicloud/cloudinfo/pkg/cloudinfo
